text: Courage () is a 2011 Polish action film directed by Greg Zglinski. == Cast == * Robert Więckiewicz as Alfred Firlej * Łukasz Simlat as Jerzy Firlej * Gabriela Muskała as Viola Firlej * Marian Dziędziel as Stefan Firlej * as Anna Firlej == References == == External links == * Category:2011 action films Category:Polish films Category:Polish action films
title: Courage (2011 film)
